Products.Name: SILK SERUMS BAKUCHOLI
Products.Description: A gentle, plant based retinol alternative Without irritation and safe to use daily. Seals in hydration and smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

Products.Name: SILK SERUMS HYALURONIC
Products.Description: A powerful hydrating must-have with 1% hyaluornic acid to hydrate the skin, leaving it smoother and plumper. Uses 3 molecular sizes of HA to deeply penetrate and hydrate the skin.

Products.Name: SILK SERUMS VITAMIN C
Products.Description: A highly stable Vitamin C that delivers a potent dose of actives to help brighten dull, stressed-out skin while reducing hyperpigmentation and marks.

Products.Name: SILK SERUMS NIACINAMIDE
Products.Description: A supercharged anti-aging serum powered by 5% niacinamide a Natural vitaminB3. Increases collagen Production and combats fine lines, wrinkles.
